Package org.elephant.mapper

Interface Summary
EleMappable An interface that needs to be implemented by all objects that wish to be present on the graphical map, that will be saved/loaded and that will be exported to LPC.
 

Class Summary
AboutBox A dialog box to explain EleMapper.
DocumentHandler This class allows a map to be saved and loaded.
EleConstants This class just contains the global constants used throughout.
EleFileFilter A convenience implementation of FileFilter that filters out all files except for those type extensions that it knows about.
EleFrame The graphical part of the Mapper, this class also contains a lot of the logic for creating a map.
EleMap The EleMap class defines the map object which contains all the information required to build an area in LPC.
EleMapper EleMapper is a tool used by wizards of Elephant Mud to help map an area.
EleUtils A class that holds useful utilities that are need by the rest of the package.
EleVector This class is used to hold a collection of rooms and/or exits so that generic functions can be performed on them.
Exit The Exit class defines an exit object, one of the two basic components of the map.
FileChooser A dialog needed to pick the relevent type of files.
Room The Room class defines a room object, one of the two basic components of the map.
 

Exception Summary
EleMapExportException Exception thrown if any problems are encountered whilst exporting to LPC.
